name: The Rainy Port Keelung 雨港基隆
description: The story will develop into the year of 1947, where the players would face one of the most traumatic historical events in the history of Taiwan.Sorry,now there are only English interface, English subtitles are still being processed,we hope to complete as soon as possible.
minimum_requirements: OS: window VISTA(32/64bit) Processor: Pentium4 1.4GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: window VISTA(32/64bit) / 7(32/64bit) / 8(32/64bit) Processor: Pentium4 1.4GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space

reviews.review_text: I played few after I buy the game. I dig into the game , the cutsence are nice. Although the dialouge in Japanese is not very good, I think the actress failed to pronounce frequently. It's still worth the price and keep my mind on the game. I pretty sure I'll finish this game. Nice one.
